title: Research Sector 27
content:

[[image http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/floridapologia/emblem1]][[/div]][[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align:center; border:0px; padding-right:5px; padding-left5px; padding-top:20px; padding-bottom:20px"]][[image http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/floridapologia/infotext alt="Text reads: Research Sector 27 encompasses a small area of temperate deciduous forest and flooded grasslands in southeast Florida. It is the location of two research and containment facilities specializing in anomalies of Class: Safe and Threat Level: Yellow or lower. Site 561 is a research and containment facility for Class: Safe objects and an archive for locally-sourced anomalous objects & artifacts. Site 789 contains the Carson Live Animal Research Facility (CLARF) and the Botanical Anomalies Garden and Arboretum (BAGA)." width="100%"]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
